name: Monday Meltdown
description:
Monday Meltdown is a fast paced 2D multiplayer shooter game. Release your inner worst monday rage in casual bloody arenas and emerge victorious in fast short rounds of gameplay





  • MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM

Engage in thrilling short multiplayer rounds where you face off against friends or foes in intense combat.
Challenge your skills, strategy, and reflexes as you strive to outsmart and outgun your opponents. It's time to unleash Monday's wrath!



  • ARSENAL OF DESTRUCTION

Equip yourself with a wide range of weapons that cater to every mood of Monday rage. From rapid-fire SMGs to devastating shotguns and brutal melee implements, pick your weapon of choice and wreak havoc on your enemies.
Make every kill count as you strive to reach the glorious ten-kill victory!



  • FUN DAY AT THE OFFICE? - CASUAL ENVIRONMENTS, MONDAY RAGE

Embark on a relentless rampage through familiar and seemingly innocent locations. The office, the gym, the grocery store and more - no place is safe from your Monday meltdown. Turn these everyday environments into blood-soaked battlefields as you battle for victory.


  • RELEASE YOUR INNER MONDAY RAGE

Unleash the pent-up frustration, stress, and annoyance of Mondays in the most satisfying way possible. Dunk on your friends in a bloody brawl.
Dive headfirst into the explosive world of Monday Meltdown and release your inner Monday rage. Satisfy your craving for destruction, dominate the competition, and emerge victorious. Are you ready to let off some steam?
